title: Palantir Developer Winter Fellowship
description:
We are now accepting applications for our 2025 Developer Winter Fellowship! Final submission deadline is January 10th, 2025 at 12:00PM EST.The Developer Winter Fellowship is an insight experience for students looking to accelerate their personal and technical growth in preparation for a successful, impactful career in tech. This is a self-guided, remote program during which you will have the unique opportunity to build groundbreaking projects using Palantir's AI Platform – AIP, during your university's winter break. The program officially runs from December 16, 2024-January 10, 2025.For the first time ever, Fellowship winners will have an expedited path toward a 2025 Summer Internship or Full-Time Role at Palantir. All participants will receive a certificate of participation, a special Palantir swag item, and a guaranteed expedited application review for 2025 summer internship or new grad roles at Palantir. Following the conclusion of the program and presentations, the top winning projects will be selected & invited to one of our US offices for an evening amongst Palantirians, a special presentation of the winning projects, and the opportunity to meet with our hiring managers. 
 What You'll Do:

Identify a Problem & Innovate with Data: This is your opportunity to identify a problem you care about, and come up with your own solution. We’ll provide some examples to get you inspired, and you are encouraged to bring any publicly available data to enrich your project.Push your limits: AIP is a platform built for developers. Expand your technical skillset by building code-forward use cases leveraging the Ontology Software Development Kit (OSDK), Large Language Models and your favorite frontend framework.Build & Create: Develop cutting-edge solutions using AIP, with guidance and support from experienced Palantirians to help you succeed. Find some examples below for inspiration!From Palantirians:    Songshare.ai with Jeg 	How I Learn German with Andy 	You Suck at AIP(!) with Ankit 	Keeping Tabswith Grant 	Fashion Assistant with AlexandreFrom Previous Fellowships: 	Satellites in Low Earth Orbit 	Expense ReportingSubmit a demo video: Showcase your Fellowship project in a < 4 minute YouTube video demonstrating the components of your workflow. This will be your chance to showcase not only what you built but share the how and why behind you project to highlight not only technical skills but abilities to communicate solutions to challenging problems. Full video submission details will be sent to you once you submit your application. Engage with the developer community: For support or questions as you build your fellowship submission please leverage community.palantir.com and tag your posts with "winter-fellowship-2024". While the requirement is to submit an individual project, collaboration is a bonus during the fellowship - we encourage you all to engage with other fellows’ posts marked with this tag. 
What We Require

US or Canadian Residency to open your personal AIP Dev Tier account.Active interest in our 2025 Summer Internship or New Grad rolesIf you have already applied this year, regardless of the outcome we encourage you to participate! This is a great opportunity to further develop your tech skills, build your relationship with Palantir, and receive feedback.  Engineering background, preferred in fields such as Computer Science, Software Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, and Data Science.Proficiency with one or more programming languages, such as Python, Java, C++, TypeScript/JavaScript, or similar.Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree at an accredited US or Canadian university and on course to graduate in 2025 or 2026. 
To apply, please submit the following:

Most recent resume or CV: Please ensure that your university and expected graduation year are clearly listed.AIP Developer Tier: Submit a link to your AIP Developer Tier Stack (URL), showcasing your technical setup and readiness to dive into the project. You can get your own AIP Developer account here! A valid credit card will be required for identity verification (KYC) purposes. Your card will not be charged. Please make sure you use the same email address for your registration and developer tier sign-up. Speedruns: Confirm that you will complete the Speedruns onlearn.palantir.combefore the program kick-off to demonstrate your proficiency with our platform and prepare for hacking!Submit your Palantir Community Username: Sign-up at https://community.palantir.com/TERMS AND CONDITIONSBy applying to the Palantir Winter Fellowship, you understand and agree that any personal data collected in connection with your online application may be used by Palantir Technologies Inc. and our subsidiaries, affiliates, and partners worldwide (collectively, “Palantir”) for purposes of processing your application, organizing and administering the Scholarship and complying with all applicable legal obligations. All personal data that you provide is subject to Palantir’s Privacy and Security Statement. Further, if you opt-in to be contacted for future employment opportunities with Palantir, you understand and agree that Palantir will retain your personal information for that purpose and may contact you in the future.QUESTIONS?Send an email to foundry-winter-fellowship@palantir.com. Please allow up to 2-3 business days for a response. ACCOMMODATIONSPalantir is committed to making the application process accessible to everyone. If you are living with a disability (visible or not visible) and require a reasonable accommodation please reach out to accommodations@palantir.com.Please be advised that this application is for an unpaid insight program and not a job opportunity.

Palantir Developer Winter Fellowship

New York, NY

Full Time Entry-level / Junior USD 68K - 126K *

Palantir Technologies

We build software that empowers organizations to effectively integrate their data, decisions, and operations.

View all jobs at Palantir Technologies

Apply now Apply later

Posted 1 month ago

We are now accepting applications for our 2025 Developer Winter Fellowship! Final submission deadline is January 10th, 2025 at 12:00PM EST.
The Developer Winter Fellowship is an insight experience for students looking to accelerate their personal and technical growth in preparation for a successful, impactful career in tech. This is a self-guided, remote program during which you will have the unique opportunity to build groundbreaking projects using Palantir's AI Platform – AIP, during your university's winter break. The program officially runs from December 16, 2024-January 10, 2025.
For the first time ever, Fellowship winners will have an expedited path toward a 2025 Summer Internship or Full-Time Role at Palantir. All participants will receive a certificate of participation, a special Palantir swag item, and a guaranteed expedited application review for 2025 summer internship or new grad roles at Palantir. Following the conclusion of the program and presentations, the top winning projects will be selected & invited to one of our US offices for an evening amongst Palantirians, a special presentation of the winning projects, and the opportunity to meet with our hiring managers. 

What You'll Do:

  • Identify a Problem & Innovate with Data: This is your opportunity to identify a problem you care about, and come up with your own solution. We’ll provide some examples to get you inspired, and you are encouraged to bring any publicly available data to enrich your project.
  • Push your limits: AIP is a platform built for developers. Expand your technical skillset by building code-forward use cases leveraging the Ontology Software Development Kit (OSDK), Large Language Models and your favorite frontend framework.
  • Build & Create: Develop cutting-edge solutions using AIP, with guidance and support from experienced Palantirians to help you succeed. Find some examples below for inspiration!

    • From Palantirians:
  •   Songshare.ai with Jeg
  •   How I Learn German with Andy
  •   You Suck at AIP(!) with Ankit
  •   Keeping Tabswith Grant
  •   Fashion Assistant with Alexandre
    • From Previous Fellowships:
  •   Satellites in Low Earth Orbit
  •   Expense Reporting


  • Submit a demo video: Showcase your Fellowship project in a < 4 minute YouTube video demonstrating the components of your workflow. This will be your chance to showcase not only what you built but share the how and why behind you project to highlight not only technical skills but abilities to communicate solutions to challenging problems. Full video submission details will be sent to you once you submit your application.
  • Engage with the developer community: For support or questions as you build your fellowship submission please leverage community.palantir.com and tag your posts with "winter-fellowship-2024". While the requirement is to submit an individual project, collaboration is a bonus during the fellowship - we encourage you all to engage with other fellows’ posts marked with this tag. 

What We Require

  • US or Canadian Residency to open your personal AIP Dev Tier account.
  • Active interest in our 2025 Summer Internship or New Grad roles
  • If you have already applied this year, regardless of the outcome we encourage you to participate! This is a great opportunity to further develop your tech skills, build your relationship with Palantir, and receive feedback.
  • Engineering background, preferred in fields such as Computer Science, Software Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, and Data Science.
  • Proficiency with one or more programming languages, such as Python, Java, C++, TypeScript/JavaScript, or similar.
  • Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree at an accredited US or Canadian university and on course to graduate in 2025 or 2026. 

To apply, please submit the following:

  • Most recent resume or CV: Please ensure that your university and expected graduation year are clearly listed.
  • AIP Developer Tier: Submit a link to your AIP Developer Tier Stack (URL), showcasing your technical setup and readiness to dive into the project. You can get your own AIP Developer account here! A valid credit card will be required for identity verification (KYC) purposes. Your card will not be charged. Please make sure you use the same email address for your registration and developer tier sign-up.
  • Speedruns: Confirm that you will complete the Speedruns onlearn.palantir.combefore the program kick-off to demonstrate your proficiency with our platform and prepare for hacking!
  • Submit your Palantir Community Username: Sign-up at https://community.palantir.com/
TERMS AND CONDITIONS
By applying to the Palantir Winter Fellowship, you understand and agree that any personal data collected in connection with your online application may be used by Palantir Technologies Inc. and our subsidiaries, affiliates, and partners worldwide (collectively, “Palantir”) for purposes of processing your application, organizing and administering the Scholarship and complying with all applicable legal obligations. All personal data that you provide is subject to Palantir’s Privacy and Security Statement. Further, if you opt-in to be contacted for future employment opportunities with Palantir, you understand and agree that Palantir will retain your personal information for that purpose and may contact you in the future.
QUESTIONS?
Send an email to foundry-winter-fellowship@palantir.com. Please allow up to 2-3 business days for a response. 
ACCOMMODATIONS
Palantir is committed to making the application process accessible to everyone. If you are living with a disability (visible or not visible) and require a reasonable accommodation please reach out to accommodations@palantir.com.
Please be advised that this application is for an unpaid insight program and not a job opportunity.
Apply now Apply later

* Salary range is an estimate based on our AI, ML, Data Science Salary Index 💰
